column2: "Na dza ɔfa nsɛm a hom kyerɛwee brɛɛ me dɛ
column3: Oye ma ɔbanyin dɛ ɔmmfa noho nnka ɔbaa no ho dze
column6: hom mma ɔbanyin biara nnya nankasa ne yer
column7: na ɔbaa biara nnya nankasa no kun."

column2: "Wɔmma okun no nyɛ n’asɛdze mma ɔyer no dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ
column3: na ɔyer no so nnyɛ dza ɔsɛ dɛmara so mma okun no."

column2: "Ɔyer no nnyi nankasa ne nyimpadua do tum
column3: na mbom okun no a
column4: na dɛmara so na okun no nnyi nankasa ne nyimpadua do tum

column2: "Mma hom mmfa homho nnkam homho
column3: gyedɛ hom yɛ anokor wɔ mber bi
column4: ama hom eenya asɔr no ho adagyer
column5: na hom aasan ebehyia mu bio
column6: amma hom ho a hom nntum nnsie ntsi

column2: "Na iyi meka no ɔkwanma afamu
column3: na nnyɛ nhyɛdo bi a."

column2: "Na mepɛ dɛ nkyɛ nyimpa nyina yɛ dɛ mbrɛ metse yi; naaso obiara wɔ n’adom akyɛdze fi Nyankopɔn hɔ: obi wɔ no dɛm
column3: obi so wɔ no dɛm."

column2: "Na meka kyerɛ esigyafo nye ekunafo dɛ
column3: Oye ma hɔn dɛ wɔtsena hɔ dɛ emi."

column2: "Na sɛ wonnyi ahohyɛdo a
column3: wɔnwar: na awar ye kyɛn dɛ ibenya akɔndɔ bɔn."

column2: "Na awarfo dze
column3: mehyɛ hɔn
column4: nnyɛ emi a
column6: dɛ mma ɔbaa nngyaa no kun

column2: "(na sɛ ogyaa no a
column3: ondzi sigyaw; annyɛ dɛm a
column4: ɔnye no kun nkɔbɔ mu); na mma okun so nngyaa ne yer."

column2: "Na nkaa no dze
column3: emi na meka
column4: na nnyɛ Ewuradze a
column6: Sɛ onua bi wɔ yer a ɔnnyɛ gyedzinyi
column7: na sɛ ɔbaa no pen dɛ ɔnye no tsena a

column2: "Na ɔbaa so a ɔwɔ kun a ɔnngye nndzi no
column3: na sɛ okun no pen dɛ ɔnye no tsena a
column4: mma ɔnngyaa no."

column2: "Na okun a ɔnngye nndzi no ho tsew ɔyer no mu
column3: na ɔyer a ɔnngye nndzi no ho tsew okun no mu: ɔnntse dɛm a
column4: nna hom mba ho wɔ fi
column5: na afei dze hɔn ho tsew."

column2: "Na sɛ nyia ɔnngye nndzi pɛ dɛ ogyaa kɔ a
column3: ma ongyaa; onua kor no
column4: anaa akyerɛbaa kor no wɔnnkyekyer no wɔ dɛm asɛm yi mu: na asomdwee mu na Nyankopɔn afrɛ hɛn."

column2: "Na ɔyer
column3: bi a sɛ ebɛgye wo kun nkwa a
column4: ana inyim? Anaaso okun
column5: sɛ ebɛgye wo yer nkwa a

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze akyekyɛ ama obiara no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn afrɛ obiara no
column4: dɛmara na ɔmbɔ ne bra; na mbrɛ mehyehyɛ no wɔ asɔr nyina mu nye no."

column2: "Sɛ wɔfrɛɛ obi na ɔyɛ twatsianyi a
column3: mma ɔnndan monomonomnyi; sɛ wɔfrɛɛ obi na ɔyɛ monomonomnyi a
column4: mma wonntwa no twatsia."

column2: "Twatsiatwa nnyɛ hwee
column3: na monomonomyɛ so nnyɛ hwee
column4: na mbom Nyankopɔn ahyɛdze ne ndzido na ohia."

column2: "Ɔfrɛ kor a wɔfrɛɛ obi wɔ mu no
column3: wɔmma ɔntsena mu."

column2: "Wɔfrɛɛ wo na eyɛ akowaa a
column3: mma ɔnnyɛ wo asɛm
column4: na sɛ ibotum enya wo fahodzi a

column2: "Na nyia wɔfrɛɛ no Ewuradze mu na ɔyɛ akowaa no
column3: ɔyɛ Ewuradze ne dehyee; dɛmara so na ɔdehye a wɔfrɛɛ no no
column4: ɔyɛ Kraest Jesus akowaa."

column2: "Wɔdze bo tɔɔ hom: mma hom nnyɛ nyimpa nkowaa."
"Enuanom
column3: biribiara a wɔafrɛ obi wɔ mu no
column4: ɔnoara mu na ɔnye Nyankopɔn ntsena."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnnwaree ho dze
column3: minnyi Ewuradze hɔ ahyɛdze bi
column4: na meka m’adwen dɛ nyia oenya Ewuradze hɔ ehumbɔbɔr dɛ ondzi nokwar."

column2: "Na dza mususu dɛ oye nye dɛ sesei ahohia yi ntsi oye ma nyimpa dɛ ɔtsena hɔ dɛmara."
"Edze wo ho abata ɔyer ho anaa? Mma nnhwehwɛ dɛ ebɛsan. Ɔyer bi mmbata wo ho anaa? Mma nnhwehwɛ ɔyer."
"Na sɛ awar mpo a
column3: ennyɛ bɔn
column4: na sɛ ɔbaabun war a
column5: ɔnnyɛ bɔn; naaso dɛm nkorɔfo no benya ɔhaw wɔ honam mu
column7: mepɛ dɛ nkyɛ motwe hom fi ɔhaw no ho."

column2: "Na iyi na meka enuanom
column3: dɛ woetwa mber no tsia
column4: ntsi afei hɔn a wɔwɔ yernom nyɛ dɛ wonnyi bi;"

column2: "na hɔn a wosu no nyɛ dɛ wonnsu
column3: na hɔn a hɔn enyi agye nyɛ dɛ hɔn enyi nngye
column4: na hɔn a wɔtɔ nyɛ dɛ wonnyi hwee
column6: "na hɔn a wɔdze wiadze ayɛ hɔndze
column7: nnyɛ dɛ wɔmmfa nnyɛ nnhwee; osiandɛ wiadze no su rutwa mu."

column2: "Na mepɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom nnkɛyɛ dadwen. Osigyanyi yɛ Ewuradze ndzɛmba ho dadwen
column3: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ asɔ Ewuradze enyi;"

column2: "na ɔwarfo dze
column3: ɔyɛ wiadze ndzɛmba ho dadwen
column4: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ asɔ ne yer enyi."

column2: "Na sorbi da ɔbaawarfo nye ɔbaabun ntamu: ɔbaa sigyanyi yɛ dadwen wɔ Ewuradze ndzɛmba ho
column3: ama no ho aatsew wɔ nyimpadua nye sunsum so mu; na ɔbaawarfo dze
column4: ɔyɛ dadwen wɔ wiadze ndzɛmba ho

column2: "Homankasa hom yie ntsi na meka yi
column3: nnyɛ dɛ merehyɛ hom
column4: na mbom fɛw a ɔbɛyɛ
column5: na ɔsom a hom bɔsom Ewuradze enyim dɛ biribi nnyɛ hom basabasa ntsi a."

column2: "Na sɛ obi dwen dɛ ne ndzeyɛɛ wɔ ne baabun a ɔaso awar do mmfata
column3: na sɛ ohia so a
column4: wɔmma ɔnyɛ dza ɔpɛ; ɔnnyɛ bɔn

column2: "Na nyia ogyina n’akoma mu pintsinn
column3: na ahohia bi nnda no do
column4: na ɔwɔ nankasa ne pɛ do tum
column5: na oesua n’akoma mu dɛ ɔbɛma ne baabun atsena hɔ no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nyia ɔwar n’esiwayer no yɛ no yie
column3: na nyia ɔmmfa no mma awar no bɛyɛ yie asen no."

column2: "Ber tsentsen a ɔbaa no kun tse ase no wɔakyekyer no
column3: na sɛ no kun ka beebi a
column4: nna odzi noho dɛ ɔwar obiara a ɔpɛ
column5: mbom Ewuradze mu nko na ɔnyɛ."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔtsena hɔ dɛmara a
column3: iyi na ɔyɛ nhyira ma no
column4: mbrɛ m’adwen tse nye no: na mususu dɛ mo so mowɔ Nyankopɔn Sunsum no."
